page.title: 03DEVORAN C P SCHOOL
page.content: In the school we have 3 classrooms, middle room (for assemblies), office, canteen and an Eliot hut (in the play_ ground).There are 4 classes,and one is in the Church Hall next door.There are 4 teachers: Mrs Lynn_Smith(Head), Mrs Cook, Mrs Lapham(Deputy) and Mrs Cart_ lidge. We also have 2 part_timers: Mrs Mullett and Mrs Malone_Bartrip. There are about 100 children aged from 4-11. There are three small playgrounds. In one of them there is a raised garden bed with shrubs, flowers and veget- ables. The toilets are outside. P.E. is done in the Village Hall and Games on the field next door. We have a sec- retary, caretaker, two canteen staff and two dinner ladies. The secretary helps with the 'rising 5's'. We go to Truro Baths once a week for swimming. There are 2 BBC computers with disk drives, also a 'turtle'.
